__TOC__


This week's <nowiki>[[QATeam-Hackfest|Hackfest]]</nowiki> will focus on '''manual and automated tests'''!

After you decide you want to work on an item put your '''<nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/QATeam/ContributingTestcases/Launchpad|Launchpad Id]]</nowiki>''' in the last column and set the row's background to yellow by changing '''white''' for '''yellow''' after '''background-color=''', this will let people know that you're working on it. When you're done come back and change it to green by using '''lightgreen'''. The goal is to have a beautiful green wallpaper =P.

=== Manual testcases ===
'''To mark it off the list you should:'''
 {*} Verify the test is still needed or requires work to run successfully on the latest development version, aka Ubuntu Raring

 {*} Modify the testcase to match the current behavior

 {*} Request a merge against the https://launchpad.net/ubuntu-manual-tests project

Instructions: https://wiki.ubuntu.com/QATeam/ContributingTestcases/Manual
